titles.title: Never Again International Outbreak Prevention Act
Never Again International Outbreak Prevention Act
Never Again International Outbreak Prevention Act
To provide accountability with respect to international reporting and monitoring of outbreaks of novel viruses and diseases.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, the Judiciary, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
